feature-privacy-by-default-description: Gone are the days of fiddling around with settings and extensions. It's all ready for you.
feature-migration-description: Migrating all your bookmarks and browsing history takes seconds.
feature-extensions-description: All your favourite extensions from Chromium and Firefox browsers are available.
feature-carousel-section-ad-blocking-des: Dot Shield is a powerful ad-blocker built right into Dot. It stays out your way and blocks most advertisements and trackers.
feature-carousel-section-quick-launch-de: You can quickly navigate webpages <webicon></webicon>, search your history <historyicon></historyicon> bookmarks <bookmarksicon></bookmarksicon> and downloads <downloadsicon></downloadsicon> all by pressing <launcherkbd></launcherkbd>  to open the launcher.
feature-carousel-section-anti-fingerprin: Dot will automatically randomise your browser configuration to make you blend in while browsing the web.
feature-carousel-section-oss-description: Open-source technologies are at the core of Dot Browser. You can view the <bl>source of the browser</bl> and <gl>other projects</gl> on our GitHub.
